name: Artillery
flavor: Creates delayed flat damage zones randomly.
passive: After this Deploys, they choose one of the following shapes: two ∞ length Lines so long as they have no adjacent spaces, a 3x3 Zone, a 2x5 Zone, all the spaces on the board's edges. After this Deploys it may indicate its chosen shape anywhere on the board. At the end of each Round this deals [Tension] damage to all Opponents within the indicated space. It then chooses a new area to indicate with this NPC’s passive.

name: Collateral
passive:
When this is deployed, place a number of friendly NPCs into empty spaces equal to 1.5x the number of PCs, each has 5 + [Tier] Health and cannot take Turns. Create a 'Peril' clock with as many segments as the number of PCs. If a friendly NPC is Knocked Out, fill one segment of the Peril clock. If the Peril clock is full, the PCs lose the combat.

 Enemies may target this NPC as though it were a player if it is not adjacent to another non-VIP player or player owned summon. Otherwise, they may not harm it under any circumstances.

 Players may remove this character from the scene without triggering their Knock Out effect by Interacting with them and passing a challenge 1 + [Tier] Spirit roll.

name: Contagion
passive:
When this is Attached, indicate a player character instead. At the end of each Round this deals

 [Tension] damage to all Opponents within 3 spaces of the indicated player character (not including said character). It then chooses a new player character to nominate.

name: Haven
flavor: Punishes players who leave a “safe zone”.
passive: When this is Attached, indicate a 3x3 area instead. At the end of each Round this deals [Tension] damage to all Opponents outside the indicated Zone on the board. It then moves the Indicated Zone anywhere on the board.

name: Isolation
flavor: Punishes players who stay far apart..
passive: When this is Attached, indicate a player character. At the end of each Round this deals 2 + [Tier] damage multiplied by the number of player characters to all Opponents within 3 spaces of the indicated player character (not including said character). This damage is divided by the number of characters receiving it. It then indicates another player.

name: Legion
passive:
When this Modifier is deployed draw a ‘Legion Clock’ with Segments equal to the deployed players +

 [Tier]. Every time a non-Fodder enemy is Knocked Out, fill one segment. When the Legion Clock is filled Knock Out all enemies and end the combat.

 At the start of each Round, This Modifier returns up to

 [Tension] non-Compound enemies who have been Knocked Out to a space on the board’s edge at half Health. If there are less enemies to return than the Tension, create Fodder Zones equal to the difference on the edge of the board.

name: Earthquake
passive: When this is Attached, indicate “In” or “Out”. At the end of each Round this deals [Tension] damage to all Opponents further than 2 spaces of the Host if “In” is indicated or within two spaces of the Host if “Out” is indicated. It then indicates the other option with this NPC’s passive.

name: Gargantuan
flavor: Makes the host take up the entire arena.
attack:
Target up to two 2x2 Zones anywhere on the board, removing any terrain created by this Attack, destroying any Terrain there, pushing all characters out, and placing terrain in those spaces. When these terrain pieces are targeted the user targets this instead. This NPC and its other Parts can draw its range from the Terrain it has created. Roll 4 + [Tier].
Reward: Deal [Hits] + [Tension] damage to characters moved by this Attack.

name: Giant
flavor: Makes the host really large and tanky.
passive: The Host takes up 2x2 spaces. The NPC this is attached to gains the following Attack as an option on their Turn.
attack: The Host moves up to 4 spaces in a straight line, ignoring opponents. Any opponents who’re moved through are pushed to unoccupied spaces adjacent to the Host's new location and are Launched.

name: VIP
flavor: A vulnerable NPC that players must protect.
passive: When this is deployed, place a friendly NPC into an empty space, it has 15 + [Tier] Health and cannot take Turns. Once per Turn, when an ally moves out of adjacency with the NPC, they may move it to their new position. If this is Knocked Out, all Players are Knocked Out. Enemies may target this NPC as though it were a player summon if it is not adjacent to another non-VIP player or player owned summon. Otherwise, they may not harm it under any circumstances.

name: Vortex
flavor: Pulls high priority fodder toward the host.
passive: When this is Attached, create four fodder zones spread across the border(s) furthest from the attached NPC at the end of each Round. These Fodder Zones can only move if they move closer to the Host. ​ If a Fodder Zone from this attack touches the Host it is KOed and the Host gains 1 Armor until the end of the Scene. If its Armor increases by 5 from this effect, it deals 20 + [Tier × 2] damage to all players.
